00001 #include "FieldPanel.h"
00002 
00003 static wxPen pens[5] = {*wxTRANSPARENT_PEN, wxPen(wxColour(0, 0, 255)), wxPen(wxColour(255, 255, 0)), *wxRED_PEN, *wxGREEN_PEN};
00004 static wxBrush brushes[5] = {*wxTRANSPARENT_BRUSH, *wxBLUE_BRUSH, wxBrush(wxColour(255, 255, 0)), *wxRED_BRUSH, *wxGREEN_BRUSH};
00005 
00006 static wxPen invalidPen = wxPen(wxColour(192, 192, 192));
00007 static wxBrush invalidBrush = wxBrush(wxColour(192, 192, 192));
00008 
00009 
00010 FieldPanel::FieldPanel(Game *game, wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size)
00011 :wxPanel(parent, id, pos, size, wxTAB_TRAVERSAL | wxFULL_REPAINT_ON_RESIZE)
00012 {
00013       SetOwnBackgroundColour(*wxWHITE);
00014       Show(true);
00015       BlokusGame = game;
00016 
00017 
00018       TileX = 0;
00019       TileY = 0;
00020 }
00021 
00022 void FieldPanel::OnPaint(wxPaintEvent &event)
00023 {
00024       wxPaintDC dc(this);
00025       int width, height;
00026       Tile *displayTile = BlokusGame->getField();
00027 
00028       GetClientSize(&width, &height);
00029 
00030       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < displayTile->Width; ++i)
00031       {
00032             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < displayTile->Height; ++j)
00033             {
00034                   Block b = displayTile->Blocks[j*displayTile->Width + i];
00035                   if(b == BLOCK_EMPTY)
00036                         continue;
00037 
00038                   dc.SetPen(pens[b]);
00039                   dc.SetBrush(brushes[b]);
00040 
00041                   dc.DrawRectangle(i*width/displayTile->Width, j*height/displayTile->Height,
00042                   (i+1)*width/displayTile->Width-i*width/displayTile->Width,
00043                   (j+1)*height/displayTile->Height-j*height/displayTile->Height);
00044             }
00045       }
00046 
00047       BlokusTile *blokusTile = BlokusGame->getCurrentPlayer()->getCurrentTile();
00048 
00049       if(BlokusGame->isValidPlace(blokusTile, TileX, TileY))
00050       {
00051             dc.SetPen(pens[BlokusGame->getCurrentPlayer()->getTeam()]);
00052             dc.SetBrush(brushes[BlokusGame->getCurrentPlayer()->getTeam()]);
00053       }
00054 
00055       else
00056       {
00057             dc.SetPen(invalidPen);
00058             dc.SetBrush(invalidBrush);
00059       }
00060 
00061       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < blokusTile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00062       {
00063             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < blokusTile->getTileData()->Height; ++j)
00064             {
00065                   Block b = blokusTile->getTileData()->Blocks[j*blokusTile->getTileData()->Width + i];
00066 
00067                   if(b == BLOCK_EMPTY)
00068                         continue;
00069 
00070                   dc.DrawRectangle((TileX+i)*width/displayTile->Width, (TileY+j)*height/displayTile->Height,
00071                   (TileX+i+1)*width/displayTile->Width-(TileX+i)*width/displayTile->Width,
00072                   (TileY+j+1)*height/displayTile->Height-(TileY+j)*height/displayTile->Height);
00073 
00074             }
00075       }
00076 
00077       // Draw lines
00078       dc.SetPen(*wxBLACK_PEN);
00079       dc.SetBrush(*wxTRANSPARENT_BRUSH);
00080 
00081       for(unsigned int i = 1; i < displayTile->Width; ++i)
00082       {
00083             dc.DrawLine(i*width/displayTile->Width, 0, i*width/displayTile->Width, height);
00084       }
00085 
00086       for(unsigned int i = 1; i < displayTile->Height; ++i)
00087       {
00088             dc.DrawLine(0, i*height/displayTile->Height, width, i*height/displayTile->Height);
00089       }
00090 }

00092 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(FieldPanel, wxPanel)
00093     EVT_PAINT(FieldPanel::OnPaint)
